sentences.en: Able to turn workpiece at 360 degree and process.
sentences.cn: 工件可360度任意旋转、加工.

sentences.en: If the workpiece feed speed is reduced, the friction coefficient will increase.
sentences.cn: 当工件进给速度减小时, 工件与砂轮磨损平面间的摩擦因数增大.

sentences.en: Preparing the clamping and measuring ways and tools for manufacturing the workpiece.
sentences.cn: 为零件的制造编制装夹和测量的方法和工具工装.

sentences.en: Remove extra brims quickly and smoothly without hurting the workpiece.
sentences.cn: 能心事削除毛边,不伤本体,修边光滑.

sentences.en: Suitable for the small quantity production of medium and small - sized workpiece.
sentences.cn: 适用于 中小型 零件的小批量生产.

sentences.en: Swing by the workpiece Austempered durable manufacturing of energy - efficient industrial - type furnace.
sentences.cn: 采用工件摆动式等温淬火工艺制造的节能耐用型工业电炉.

sentences.en: The carriage feeds the tool while the workpiece rotates.
sentences.cn: 当工件旋转时,拖板送进刀具.

sentences.en: The grinding machine raises the precision of the workpiece and improves its surface finish.
sentences.cn: 磨床可以提高工件的精度与表面的光洁度.

sentences.en: The measured object is cylinder workpiece instead of the reference bar.
sentences.cn: 测量对象是在该机床上加工的圆柱形工件,而不是通常所使用的标准棒.

sentences.en: The workpiece is already on the lathe.
This method applies only to open workpiece surface defect detection.
sentences.cn: 此法仅适用于检出工件表面开口缺陷.

sentences.en: This paper introducest he application of workpiece coordinates in EDM.
sentences.cn: 介绍了工件坐标系在电火花加工中的应用.

sentences.en: This workpiece doesn't need to be cut short.
We used grinding machines only to smooth and finish a workpiece.
sentences.cn: 我们只是用磨床将工件抛光和精加工.

sentences.en: With some CNC machines, even the workpiece loading process has been automated.
sentences.cn: 在有些数控机床上, 甚至工件装夹的过程都是自动化的.

trans.tran_en: a piece of metal or other material that is in the process of being worked on or made or has actually been cut or shaped by a hand tool or machine
